document_data.mainbody:
he Settler Camp outside Leilon was a temporary encampment during the towns reconstruction in the late 15 century DR. It was managed by Mazira Shae.
The vast settler camp outside of Leilon consisted of circled wagons, tents, cooking fires, and supply containers. The town council met there on a regular basis to plan the rebuilding and address any risks in the area, and the majority of the towns business was conducted there.
The Settler Camp was situated under the trees along the High Road just south of Leilon.
By the early 1490s DR, great strides had been made to rebuild Leilon at the behest of Dagult Neverember, Lord Protector of Neverwinter. During the towns reconstruction, the Settler Camp was the settlers temoprary home.
